meanings.sent1: The scientist was gasifying the liquid to study its properties.
meanings.sent2: The wood chips were gasifying in the furnace to produce biofuel.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand seemed to be gasifying objects into thin air!
meanings.sent4: The sun's heat was gasifying the snow, turning it into vapor.
meanings.sent5: The potion's effect was like gasifying fear into courage.

meanings.sent1: The solid material was slowly gasifying in the intense heat.
meanings.sent2: The organic waste was gasifying as part of the composting process.
meanings.sent3: The ice cube was gasifying faster than expected in the warm room.
meanings.sent4: The old memories were gasifying in her mind, fading away with time.
meanings.sent5: The dream was gasifying into fragments as she woke up.
